We'd like to wait a bit before deciding to add the swish activation function to pytorch. Please see this and this for previous discussion on this topic.

this is how you would go about implementing it :)

We'd like to wait a bit before deciding to add the swish activation function to pytorch. Please see this and this for previous discussion on this topic.
this is how you would go about implementing it :)
body:
We'd like to wait a bit before deciding to add the swish activation function to pytorch. Please see [this](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/3182#issuecomment-337982454) and [this](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/3169#issuecomment-337736118) for previous discussion on this topic.

[this](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/3182#issuecomment-337982454) is how you would go about implementing it :)
